text: Ricardo Javier Hurtado (born August 22, 1999) is an American actor. He is known for his role as Freddy on the 2016 Nickelodeon television series School of Rock and his role as Tyler on the 2019 Netflix TV series Malibu Rescue. ==Life and career== Hurtado was born in Miami, Florida, to musician Ricardo Hurtado and Ofelia Ramirez, both are from Nicaragua. At age one he moved to Atlanta with his parents. Hurtado began acting in 2016, and first appeared on the Nickelodeon television series School of Rock as Freddy. He is starring as Tyler Gossard in Malibu Rescue. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Title ! Role !
